TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ServiceHost extends System.ServiceModel.ServiceHostBase

span.span: Provides a host for services.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務模型程式設計模型所使用的主機。Implements the host used by the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service model programming model. 如果您不是使用 Internet Information Services (IIS) 或 Windows Activation Services (WAS) 公開服務，可以使用 類別來設定和公開服務，以供用戶端應用程式使用。Use the class to configure and expose a service for use by client applications when you are not using Internet Information Services (IIS) or Windows Activation Services (WAS) to expose a service. IIS 和 WAS 都會代表您與 物件進行互動。Both IIS and WAS interact with a object on your behalf. 若要公開服務供呼叫端使用，WCF 必須有完整的服務描述 (由類別)。To expose a service for use by callers, WCF requires a complete service description (represented by the class). 類別會從服務類型及組態資訊建立 ，然後使用這個描述來為描述中的每個端點建立 物件。The class creates a from the service type and configuration information and then uses that description to create objects for each endpoint in the description. 您可以使用 物件，載入服務、設定端點、套用安全性設定，以及啟動接聽項處理傳入要求。Use a object to load a service, configure endpoints, apply security settings, and start listeners to handle incoming requests. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/cs/wholeenchilada.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_SelfHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_selfhost/vb/wholeenchilada.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有兩個建構函式 (Constructor) 可以用來建立 類別的執行個體。There are two constructors used to create an instance of the class. 在多數時候，會使用接受服務類型當做輸入參數的 建構函式。Use the constructor which takes the service type as an input parameter, most of the time. 主機可以依需要使用這個建構函式來建立新服務。The host can use this to create new services as needed. 只有在您想要讓服務主機使用服務的特定單一執行個體時，才需要改用 建構函式。Use the constructor instead only when you want the service host to use a specific singleton instance of the service.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the instance of the service and its base addresses specified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要將特定物件執行個體提供給單一服務使用時，可以使用這個建構函式做為實作自訂 的另一種方式。Use this constructor as an alternative to implementing a custom when you want to provide a specific object instance for use by a singleton service. 當服務實作類型很難建構時 (例如，無法實作沒有參數的預設公用建構函式時)，您可能會想要使用這個多載。You may want to use this overload when your service implementation type is difficult to construct (for example, if it does not implement a default public constructor that has no parameters). 請注意，這個多載來提供物件時，某些功能相關至 Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 執行個體行為的運作方式。Note that when an object is provided to this overload, some features related to the Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) instancing behavior work differently. 例如，使用這個建構函式多載提供已知的物件執行個體時，呼叫 將沒有作用。For example, calling have no effect when a well-known object instance is provided using this constructor overload. 同樣的，也會忽略任何其他執行個體的釋放機制。Similarly, any other instance release mechanism is ignored. 的行為就像是所有作業都已將 屬性設定為 。The always behaves as if the property is set to for all operations. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEServiceHost2#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueservicehost2/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEServiceHost2#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueservicehost2/vb/service.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您知道服務類型時，可以使用這個建構函式，在需要時建立新的執行個體 (即便您只是需要一個單一執行個體)。Use this constructor when you have the service type and you can create new instances of it when needed, even when you need a singleton instance. 只有在您想要讓服務主機使用服務的特定單一執行個體時，才需要改用 建構函式。Use the constructor instead only when you want the service host to use a specific singleton instance of the service. ## Examples 這個範例說明如何使用 類別來裝載 Windows Communication Foundation 服務：This sample illustrates how to use the class to host a Windows Communication Foundation service: [!code-csharp[S_UEServiceHost#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueservicehost/cs/service.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEServiceHost#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_ueservicehost/vb/service.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法，從自訂程式撰寫模型中建構合約描述。This method is used to construct contract descriptions from customized programming models. 請覆寫對應的基底類別方法 ，以實作自訂模型。Override the corresponding base class method, , to implement the customized model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有了這個方法之後，就不需要將基底位址和 一起傳遞。This method removes the requirement for passing base addresses as part of . 繼承自 的類別可以呼叫 ，然後於可以取得基底位址時再呼叫其中一個 。Classes that inherit from can call and then can call one of the when a base address is available. 這就是實作 Service Model Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe) 的方式。This is how the Service Model Metadata Utility Tool (Svcutil.exe) is implemented.

span.span: Gets the singleton instance of the hosted service.
The hosted service object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您想要控制使用中服務的執行個體時，可以使用 建構函式，初始化要裝載服務的單一執行個體。Use the constructor to initialize a singleton instance of the service to be hosted when you want to control the instance of the service that is used.
